nodes.description: 1995年4月19日，Oklahoma City Murrah联邦大厦遭遇汽车炸弹袭击，造成168人死亡
nodes.support_text: It was, without a doubt, one of the most significant -- and tragic -- events in Oklahoma's rich history.

nodes.description: 2010年3月，记者Alex Cameron报道Oklahoma州教育系统未将爆炸事件纳入必修课程
nodes.support_text: Monday, March 29th 2010... How could the state that declared to the world that it would 'always remember' April 19, 1995... allow the first generation not to have any personal recollection of the tragedy to forget it?

nodes.description: 2010年，纪念执行总监Kari Watkins在母校演讲时发现高中生对爆炸事件一无所知
nodes.support_text: As I looked out at the 250 or so high school students, I could just see this blank stare, like I was almost speaking a foreign language... they had no idea what I was talking about when I mentioned the Oklahoma City bombing.

nodes.description: 家长Ann-Clore Duncan反映子女的学校历史课程未涉及爆炸事件
nodes.support_text: The bombing hasn't been covered in their history classes at all... it's not currently part of their required curriculum.

nodes.description: 历史教师Bobby Tanner指出教材仅用2页篇幅介绍爆炸事件，且非州考核标准
nodes.support_text: flipping through his copy of Oklahoma Adventure. 'So, for such a big deal, we've got basically two pages.' The other Oklahoma history textbooks used in the state have roughly the same number of pages dedicated to the bombing.

nodes.description: 2010年，Oklahoma州教育部门通过修改PASS标准将爆炸事件纳入历史课程
nodes.support_text: State Superintendent of Public Instruction Sandy Garrett and the State Board of Education did earlier this year. They amended the PASS standards to include the Oklahoma City bombing, ...

nodes.description: 议员Lee Denney提出法案HB 2750，推动将爆炸事件法定化入课程
nodes.support_text: still can't be a priority. 'As it is right now, no, it's not,' Tanner said, 'but... I think that's why we need to make it a priority.' And making the bombing a priority... is exactly what State Superintendent... did earlier this year.

nodes.support_text: the Survivor Tree continues to teach about resilience; the field of chairs still teach the cost of violence, while the fence reminds of the importance of community.
